articles.title: Alaskan health worker stable after allergic reaction to Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: An Alaskan health worker had a serious allergic reaction after getting Pfizer Inc and BioNTech's coronavirus vaccine, but is now stable, public health authorities said on Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: NC sees record 98 COVID deaths in a single day - WRAL.com
articles.description: North Carolina reported the largest single-day death total of the coronavirus pandemic to date on Wednesday. A record 98 new deaths were recorded.
articles.content:
Raleigh, N.C. — North Carolina reported the largest single-day death total of the coronavirus pandemic to date on Wednesday. A record 98 new deaths were recorded.
